text: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
translation: 226. Sinni gennaaqoh Agabul fidoh xayyoowe woonuwaanamah Yallal xiibite mari Affara Alsa ken Qambaalaanam-lon sinni Agabuh gacaanam kee gace waanamah, usun Affara Alsi yamurruqek duma Sinni Agabuh gaceenik, Toysa Diggah Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni Aben xiibak sinni Agabul gaceenimih Sabbatah.
